name: awareness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 knowledge that something exists, or understanding of a situation or subject at the present time based on information or experience: Public awareness of the problem will make politicians take it seriously. Environmental awareness has increased dramatically over the past decade.
More examplesFewer examplesThe leaflet has been produced with the aim of increasing public awareness of the disease.There is a growing awareness of the seriousness of this disease.Greenpeace works to promote awareness of the dangers that threaten our planet today.This task is designed to test the child's spatial awareness.The campaign has certainly succeeded in raising public awareness of the issue.
